content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'M$tr!2345678';
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [https://rhantestsa01.blob.core.windows.net/test2107020060000129]
WITH IDENTITY='Managed Identity'

-- 認証情報を利用し、外部データソースを作成
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ProductionDataSource WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://rhantestsa01.blob.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = [https://rhantestsa01.blob.core.windows.net/test2107020060000129]
);


CREATE Database DataLakeAcsessDB02 COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8

SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET
(
  BULK 'test2107020060000129/result-00200.csv',
 
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ProductionDataSource',
    FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) as [result]

SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET
(
  BULK 'test2107020060000129/result-00200.csv',
 
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ProductionDataSource',
    FORMAT = 'CSV', PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)  with (
  Col1	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8 ,
Col2	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,

Col13	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col14	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col15	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col16	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col17	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col18	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
Col19	varchar(60) collate Japanese_XJIS_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,

) as r

 where (C2 BETWEEN '11:32:00' AND '11:36:00' ) AND C6 = 'Z1DR10C0'

)  with (
  Col1	varchar(60)  ,
